description: This file defines a public configuration class `AppConfig` that provides access to environment variables, specifically the API base URL, with fallbacks for development and production environments.

classes.name: AppConfig
classes.description: A utility class that retrieves configuration values from environment variables with default fallbacks.

methods.name: apiBase
methods.description: A static getter that returns the API base URL, prioritizing the environment variable and providing sensible defaults for debug and release modes.
